detail_desc: Lightweight, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with covered elastication and a sewn-in belt at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Knee-length shorts in sturdy cotton twill with napped details. Button fly, side pockets, back pockets, a coin pocket and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Waist bag in sturdy imitation leather with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. One inner compartment. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 12 cm. Width 17 cm.
Fitted top in airy, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the top and long sleeves.

Short, padded jacket with a jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.

Trenchcoat in an airy weave made from a modal blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, side pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Top in printed, appliquéd sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Long, circular skirt in a double layer of tulle for movement and width. Regular waist with wide, covered elastication, a small frill trim at the top, and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short, wide turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top, and a flounce around the neckline.
Stylish flip-flops with soft, lightly padded leather straps and leather insoles.
Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Straight, wide legs with creases and wide turn-ups at the hems.
Cropped top in soft fabric with a round neckline and short sleeves. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short balloon sleeves in woven fabric with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume.
One-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Narrow strap over one shoulder and a wide, embroidered flounce over the other shoulder.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar, zip at the back and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that join at the back.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave containing glittery threads with a wide neckline and wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves. Wide, colourful smocking around the neckline and waist, and decorative ties at the waist with pompoms and tassels. Gathered seams around the sleeves and hem for added width. Lined.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Strapless maxi dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Integral top with elastication at the top.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with sleeves in sweatshirt fabric and a detachable, jersey-lined hood with a decorative trim. High collar, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Sleeves with a soft brushed inside. Partly lined.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. Partly lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Jacket in a soft, textured cotton knit with a lined hood and zip at the front that continues along the edges of the hood. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Large, elasticated fabric scrunchie. Diameter 16 cm.
Treggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slides with wide, crossover straps at the front. The top strap is adjustable and has a round covered metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.

Padded jacket in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and a padded, lined, drawstring hood with a folding peak at the front and adjustable tab and press-stud at the back. Concealed zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, chest pockets and front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Shoulder tabs with a press-stud and long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with an all-over print. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Brazilian briefs in mesh and satin with lace details. Mid waist, a lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Wide blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a premium cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined swimsuit in mosaic-patterned fabric made from an Econyl® blend with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways. Econyl® is nylon made from recycled fibres from fishing nets and other nylon waste, reducing impact on the climate and contributing to cleaner oceans.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Detachable hood lined with soft faux fur, a small stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.

Trousers in a cotton weave. High paper bag waist with pleats at the front, covered elastication at the back and a tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, front pockets and wide, gently tapered, loose-fitting legs with flap pockets.
Fitted, one-shoulder top in a soft rib knit with one short sleeve.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool. 3/4-length sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dress in glossy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a print motif on the front. Seam at the waist and a lined tulle skirt with multiple asymmetric tiers and a glittery top layer.
Loafers in imitation suede with a moccasin seam at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short, wide top in crushed velvet with a V-neck front and back.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lined bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Wide shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Blouse in an airy, floral-print weave with a high, smocked collar and a yoke with a frill at the front that continues over the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.

Microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Underdress in stretch microfibre with a light shaping effect on the tummy, seat and thighs. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a scallop trim and glued edges at the top for a smooth silhouette. Laser-cut hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Leggings in washed, stretch, supersoft denim. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Soft, fully lined, non-wired bra in stretch silk with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and one hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in an airy silk blend containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Top in cotton jersey with shoulder pads and short, wide sleeves.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit cardigan in soft organic cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair grips decorated with pearly plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length 9 cm, width approx. 2 cm.
Fitted thong body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Long sleeves, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with low dropped shoulders, flounces at the sides and a wide neckline.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in stretch organic cotton twill with adjustable straps that fasten at the front and elastication at the back of the waist. Pockets and fasteners at the sides, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 0-12M.
